blocks.content: A Minimalist RPG Card Game for Android Cards is a turn-based RPG card game built entirely in Android Studio using Java and native UI components. With a clean, flat design and simple sprite art, the game features four classic archetypes — tank, melee, healer, and caster — each with distinct abilities and roles.

The project was a deep dive into game logic, UI state management, and sprite-based animation within the constraints of Android’s native toolkit. No game engines, no external libraries — just raw Android components driving the entire experience.
While the visuals are intentionally minimal, the underlying mechanics offer strategic depth, making Cards a great example of how simplicity can still deliver engaging gameplay.
